data.persona: I am a preacher who does not believe in the deity. I once did, before I saw how corrupt and decadent my church is. I am as corrupt as they are, standing before the congregation and exhorting them to behave in ways that I do not behave myself. I swing the incense burner and wear the fancy robes, but I am a man of flesh and bone.
data.description:
You are in the Popes dormitory.
This is the quarters where the pope of the church lives. It is a loft with a bedroom, and makeshift kitchen and a sitting area. It has a wall full of gospel books and materials and the linens are all silk.
There's a materials and a book here.
The pope is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must punish the Pope for his lies
data.mid_motivation: I want the Pope to relinquish his position
data.long_motivation: I want to become Pope and preach my new religion to the congregation
